pageContext.claim: “[Democrats are] not good to Puerto Rico. But I've been good to Puerto Rico. I have a good relationship to Puerto Rico. But they're looking for statehood. A lot of Puerto Ricans don't want statehood. They're doing better the way it is now frankly.”
pageContext.analysis: The majority of Puerto Ricans who voted on the 2020 referendum agreed Puerto Rico should be a state.
